title: @RegisterRestClient annotation not available with Rest Client extensions enabled
body:
### Describe the bug

I created a rest client project using the Quarkus Rest Client Reactive Extension. But, the @RegisterRestClient is not available.

### Expected behavior

I expect the @RegisterRestClient to be available after extension is enabled and build is run. I am following this Quarkus Guide: https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-client-reactive


### Actual behavior

I can't find @RegisterRestClient annotation.

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce the bug:

Create a sample Quarkus project.
Add Rest Client Reactive extensions as shown in this guide.
Open project in an IDE.
The annotation @RegisterRestClient won't be available for import

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwmin Mac OS

### Output of `java -version`

11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

11

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.10.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

3.8.5

### Additional information

_No response_
